{"id":1265920279,"question_id":2696,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1716480321,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"873 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1265920279/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"The Number of Beautiful Subsets","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int n_sets;\n    public int beautifulSubsets(int[] nums, int k) {\n        n_sets = 0;\n        backtrace(new HashMap<Integer, Integer>(), nums, k, 0);\n        return n_sets;\n    }\n    private void backtrace(HashMap<Integer, Integer> multiset, int[] nums, int k, int idx) {\n        if (idx == nums.length) {\n            if (!multiset.isEmpty()) {\n                n_sets++;\n            }\n            return;\n        }\n        // backtrace(set, nums, k, idx+1);\n        // if (!set.contains(nums[idx] - k) && !set.contains(nums[idx] + k)) {\n        //     return;\n        // }\n        // set.add(nums[idx]);\n        // if (!set.contains(nums[idx] - k) && !set.contains(nums[idx] + k)) {\n        //     backtrace(set, nums, k, idx+1);\n        //     // return;\n        // }\n        // // backtrace(set, nums, k, idx+1);\n        // set.remove(Integer.valueOf(nums[idx]));\n        // backtrace(set, nums, k, idx+1);\n\n        if (multiset.get(nums[idx]-k) == null && multiset.get(nums[idx]+k) == null) {\n            multiset.putIfAbsent(nums[idx], 0);\n            multiset.compute(nums[idx], (key, v) -> v+1);\n            backtrace(multiset, nums, k, idx+1);\n            multiset.compute(nums[idx], (key, v) -> v-1);\n            if (multiset.get(nums[idx]) == 0) {\n                multiset.remove(nums[idx]);\n            }\n        }\n        backtrace(multiset, nums, k, idx+1);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"the-number-of-beautiful-subsets","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
